page.title: 11MILL FARM, BLACK BOURTON
page.content: An old disused{mill},from which this farm gets its name,stands near the farmhouse and the farmer has reintroduced fish to the millstream. Of the{190 acres}of farmland,{160 {acres}are arable, providing{barley}for the{pigs}and the rest is mainly seeded pasture but very little old pasture remains. Three people are employed by the owner who bought the farm 7 years ago. He has{240 breeding sows.}30 sows are put in a yard with each boar for mating. Alternatively, artificial insemination is used to improve the breeding stock. The ideal litter size is 10 but varies. Once they had a litter of 23 but the piglets were small. He has{230 breeding ewes}and 5 rams. The lambs are born in March and are separated from their mothers in June.
